overview:
Ben Rodier is Senior Director, Publisher Development at Mediative - a digital marketing company owned by Yellow Media (YLO). Based in Montreal, Canada, he is responsible for the company’s shopper marketing portfolio of advertising products and creative services.

National advertisers and agencies use Mediative to connect their brands with shopper audiences on leading e-commerce and retail sites. Ben’s in-depth knowledge of the digital space and content monetization strategies has helped grow revenues by more than 500% since 2010.

Prior to joining Mediative, Ben held a variety of marketing and business development roles at Canwest and its flagship Global Television Network. Marketing Magazine has featured Ben as a contributor and in their annual list of “Top 30 Marketing Professionals”.

Ben earned an MBA from Queen’s University and a Bachelor of Commerce from the John Molson School of Business.

He also serves on the Board of Directors for the Starlight Children’s Foundation of Canada.
